p: Just a quick note to say how much I enjoyed the Dick Cavette show April 27. It was like being there with you again. Many of my students saw it and learned from it also. I was happy to see my bracelet too!

I got married yesterday! We were married in Washington U.'s chapel. My new wife is named Gail. She + I both worked at the Chicago Indian Center, which is where we met. The maid of honor was the youth worker from the Center, and two of the quests were Sioux.
My parents say the TV special and enjoyed it. It was really a great show.
Regards to the Youngs. I hope you are all well and at least half as happy as I am right now.
